servinfo.title: Transmission Warning Light Circuit Check – Light Does Not Come “ON” at Ignition Switch ON (Vehicle is equipped with engine diagnosis connector)

testgroup.title: Combination Meter Power Supply Check
testgroup.question: Does other indicator / warning lights in combination meter comes ON?

action.ptxt: Repair combination meter power supply circuit referring to Combination Meter Circuit Diagram .

test1.ptxt: TCM power and ground circuit check referring to TCM Power and Ground Circuit Check .

testgroup.title: DTC check

test1.ptxt: Check DTC referring to DTC Check .

testgroup.question: Is there DTC P1774 or P1775?

paragroup.ptxt: Go to applicable DTC diag. flow.

testgroup.title: Combination Meter Function Check
testgroup.question: Does A/T selector position indicator show correct select lever position?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good TCM and recheck.
